description: Detects when a shell program such as the windows Command Prompt or PowerShell is launched with system privileges.
author: frack113
Tim Shelton (update fp)
name: Suspicious Elevated System Shell
query: ((((process.executable.text:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe OR *\\cmd.exe)) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("PowerShell.EXE" OR "pwsh.dll" OR "Cmd.Exe"))) AND (user.name:(*AUTHORI* OR *AUTORI*) AND LogonId:"0x3e7")) AND (NOT (((process.parent.executable.text:"C:\Windows\System32\CompatTelRunner.exe" AND process.parent.command_line.text:*\-m\:appraiser.dll\ \-f\:DoScheduledTelemetryRun* AND winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"PowerShell.EXE" AND process.command_line.text:*\-ExecutionPolicy\ Restricted\ \-Command\ Write\-Host*)) OR ((process.parent.executable.text:C\:\\Program\ Files\\erl\-* AND process.parent.executable.text:*\\bin\\erl.exe)) OR ((process.parent.executable.text:"C:\Windows\System32\CompatTelRunner.exe" AND process.command_line.text:*get\-vmswitch\ *)) OR ((process.parent.executable.text:"C:\Windows\System32\asgard2-agent\bin\generic.exe" AND process.command_line.text:*\ \-taskid\ * AND process.command_line.text:*\ \-name\ asgard2\-agent\ *)) OR ((process.parent.executable.text:"C:\ManageEngine\ADManager Plus\pgsql\bin\postgres.exe" AND process.executable.text:*\\cmd.exe)) OR ((process.parent.executable.text:"C:\Program Files (x86)\LANDesk\LDClient\sdistbat.exe" AND process.executable.text:*\\cmd.exe)) OR ((process.parent.executable.text:"C:\Program Files (x86)\Varonis\DatAdvantage\GridCollector\VrnsRealTimeAlertsSvc.exe" AND process.executable.text:*\\cmd.exe)) OR ((process.parent.executable.text:"C:\Program Files\Tenable\Nessus Agent\nessus-agent-module.exe" AND process.executable.text:*\\cmd.exe)))))
